To install ZXTune to dingux

1) Download and install QT for Dingux from http://www.peterbouda.de/downloads/dinguxqt.html
2) Extract this archive content to local/apps/zxtune folder
3) Edit local/dmenu/themes/${ThemeName}/menu_media.cfg:

include("/usr/local/apps/zxtune/menu.cfg")

in any place inside 'Menu' section (NOT inside 'MenuItem'!!!)
